name: Google I/O Extended 2017 GDG KANO

venue.name: StartUp Kano Hub.
venue.address_1: Sahel Garden, StartUp Kano Hub, Beside Azman Filling Station, Opposite Al-Yuma  House, Maiduguri Road, Kano

description:
Follow this link to Register.

Google I/O Extended 2017 is a simulation of an annual developer conference held by Google in San Francisco, U.S.A. I/O showcases technical in-depth sessions focused on building web, mobile, and enterprise applications with Google and open sources such as Android, Chrome and Chrome OS, APIs, Google Web Toolkit, App Engine, and more.

name: GDD Europe 2017 Extended Kano

venue.name: StartUp Kano Hub.
venue.address_1: Sahel Garden, StartUp Kano Hub, Beside Azman Filling Station, Opposite Al-Yuma  House, Maiduguri Road, Kano

description:
On September 5-6, Google Developer Days Europe will take place in Kraków, featuring technical talks on Android, the Mobile Web, Firebase, Cloud, Machine Learning, and IoT.

An Extended event will be organized by GDG Kano which includes a variety of options for attendees—from livestreaming sessions to local demos, hackathons, codelabs, and more.
how_to_find_us: 2nd Floor, Sahel garden, Opposite Al-Yuma House Daurawa Maiduguri Road Kano

name: NORTH-WEST DEVFEST 2017 KANO

venue.name: https://goo.gl/maps/c3qmTHqMmCP2
venue.address_1: Mambayya House, Aminu Kano Center for Democratic research and training, Aminu Kano Way, Kano City, Kano, Nigeria

description:
GDG DevFests are large, community-run events that can offer speaker sessions across multiple product areas, all-day hack-a-thons, code labs, and more. Our sole aim of North-West Devfest 2017 Kano is to provide multi speaker sessions and a codelab on areas gdg members are excited to follow on; android, firebase, progressive web apps (to highlight), Android Things.

Book for a printable ticket here http://kano.gdg.ng/devfest2017/

name: Version Control Systems with Auwal MS

venue.name: StartUp Kano Hub.
venue.address_1: Sahel Garden, StartUp Kano Hub, Beside Azman Filling Station, Opposite Al-Yuma  House, Maiduguri Road, Kano

description:
We will walk through how Version Control Systems and other tools are used by teams to collaborate while building products, We will also look at using Sourcetree, a powerful GUI tool that helps make it easy to use Git serving as an alternative to the CLI. Participants will get the opportunity to explore some tools like Jira, Confluence, Stripe and Trello that help make team management easy for large teams.
Visit https://git-kano.eventbrite.com to generate your ticket.

name: Google I/O Extended 2018 Kano
description:
Google I/O is an annual developer conference intended to enrich participants with new Google Technologies. Since not everyone can make it all the way to San Francisco, so to bring I/O into local communities worldwide, GDGs are organizing event series called I/O Extended. The event will bring local developer community together to experience talks and watch keynote from the IO, Product demos, Speaker Sessions and Codelabs.
Key notes
Flutter
Firebase
Google Assistant
Android
Kotlin
Tensorflow

name: NW Makeathon

venue.name: StartUp Kano Hub.
venue.address_1: Sahel Garden, StartUp Kano Hub, Beside Azman Filling Station, Opposite Al-Yuma  House, Maiduguri Road, Kano

description: The NW Makeathon is an open and intensive solution creation contest which would cut across the region with the objective of bringing together the skills and knowledge of a diverse set of individuals and institutions including entrepreneurs, start-ups, innovators, businesses, academics, policymakers, and community leaders, all committed to address the socio-economic challenges of North-West Nigeria.

name: IWD Kano '19
description:
Women Techmakers ( WTM ) creates visibility and resources for women to thrive.
Women Techmakers Kano celebrates international women's day (IWD) to highlight the talent of women in technology which focuses on community-building initiative to promote talented and passionate women, increase their visibility and empower them with resources in technology to develop and excel in their careers.
